channel.title: Posts on Blog of Andrew Sinclair
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog of Andrew Sinclair

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Hello, world! On this blog I’ll be sharing some things I’ve learned in my short career as a professional Software Developer. First some biographical information. I was born and raised in San Diego, CA. I graduated from California Polytechnic State University San Luis Obispo (Cal Poly) with a B.S. and M.S. in Computer Science. I started my career at Amazon Lab126 in Sunnyvale, CA where I worked on test automation for various Fire OS devices for the HTML5 Platform team.
